titleStmt.title: Digital Edition of Glaser Abklatsch ID: AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL314
AT-OeAW-BA-3-27-A-GL314

item.term: Early first millennium to the fourth century BC (predominance of Saba)
Fourth to first centuries BC (predominance of Qataban and Hadramawt, and their alliance with Main)
First century BC to early second century AD (alliances between the tribes of the high plateau and the ASA kingdoms)
Late second to late third centuries AD (wars among the Himyar, Saba and Hadramawt)
Fourth to sixth centuries AD (unification of Yemen under Himyarite rule)
It corresponds to the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans with sub-periods I-IV
First sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Second sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Third sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans
Fourth sub-period of the palaeographical divisions established by Jacques Ryckmans

19.Gadan bin Ḥafīd of Ẓalawm- 20.ān of the tribe of Gabʾān has married 21.and paid the bride price for ʾAbībaʿ from Gaza. 22.Laḥayān bin Saʿdʾīl of Yah- 23.irr of the tribe of Mawqah has married and paid 24.the bride price for Marʾat from ʿAynʾīl. 25.Yismaʿʾīl bin Dhuʾāb of Qawm 26.of the tribe of Yalqaẓ has married and paid the bride 27.price for Taḥyaw from Egypt. 28.Zaydʾīl bin Gabanān of 29.Bawsān of the tribe of Gabʾān has ma- 30.rried and paid the bride price for Laḥayʾab fr- 31.om Gaza. 32.ʿAbd bin Riʾāb of Ṣamaʿ 33.of the tribe of Gabʾān has married 34.and paid the bride price for ʾAmat Shamas from 35.Egypt.

Gadan bin Ḥafīd of Ẓalawm-
ān of the tribe of Gabʾān has married
and paid the bride price for ʾAbībaʿ from Gaza.
Laḥayān bin Saʿdʾīl of Yah-
irr of the tribe of Mawqah has married and paid
the bride price for Marʾat from ʿAynʾīl.
Yismaʿʾīl bin Dhuʾāb of Qawm
of the tribe of Yalqaẓ has married and paid the bride
price for Taḥyaw from Egypt.
